'''{{w|OppoSuits}}''' is a clothing company that collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]] on a ''[[Minecraft]]''-themed collection. The collection was revealed on September 4, 2025<ref>{{Cite Instagram|opposuits|DOL0AfkjQuf|Suit up, craftersâ€¦the countdown begins.ðŸŸ©<br><br>#ForEveryCrafter #OppoSuits #Minecraft<br>@minecraft|September 4, 2025}}</ref> and released on September 5, 2025.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|minecraft|DOOYzUODOjZ|Dressing for your mood, not the occasion. @OppoSuits - Shop the look + more at the link in bio!|September 5, 2025}}</ref>
